text: 10.23: Mt 16.28Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, ŋgɨp ŋgu bakɨ then ŋgɨgɨrim, mba ŋgun ki gumgi gu mbigi, mbe tɨvi mbatɨgir nden muuŋrim, nde mba ŋgu bakɨme thav ŋgɨv, harigi ŋgun bakɨmen ŋgegɨri. Gu guigira khar nde nzuai, nde mba Isreriŋ ŋguir za ŋaar vhɨzgirim, Fhe Bakɨmen Guma Guar taagi zirgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
